name: ITEM CARD 01
description:
[FEBRUARY 2022 - COLLECTORS' ONLY]

To appreciate collectors' contribution and support for Cozy Room Collection, on the first week of the month after, a free NFT will be sent directly to each collector's wallet. These NFTs are not for sale to the public.

Each month will have a different edition depending on how many people fit into the categories (see tweet). 1 person will only receive 1 collectors' only NFT.


What you can do with this NFT:

- Keep it as a part of your NFT collection.

- Sell it according to your price.

- Collect all 13 of collectors' only NFTs (February 2022 - February 2023).
Those who can collect it and inform us can ask to upgrade to an exclusive NFT (more detail about it will be announced on 1st January 2023).


Thank you for the support and attention! Happy collecting :)


For more info, read this tweet:
https://twitter.com/196PixelsLight/status/1497264185373122566?s=20&t=FTYWJHvWjUgb7Q6GKODA6w

Original art and animation by 196 Pixels Light
Music by LuxirusVein
